TestCase.name: testIntersect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[IS NOT DISTINCT FROM($0, $1)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testIntersectLeftIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 WHERE 1=0 INTERSECT SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[IS NOT DISTINCT FROM($0, $1)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testIntersectRightIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT SELECT f FROM T2 WHERE 1=0

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[IS NOT DISTINCT FROM($0, $1)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testIntersectWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM ((SELECT * FROM T1) INTERSECT (SELECT * FROM T2)) WHERE a > 1

LogicalProject(c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 1)]) +- LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 1)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(=($0, $3), AND(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($3))), OR(=($1, $4), AND(IS NULL($1), IS NULL($4))), OR(=($2, $5), AND(IS NULL($2), IS NULL($5))))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])
